unittitle_ssm: Spiller collection of Brooklyn product labels
abstract_ssm: This collection contains 25 product labels produced by Brooklyn pharmaceutical manufacturers from the early 20th century. Companies represented in the collection include Brigandi Laboratories, Central Supply Company, Atlas Drug Company, and Barget Pharmacy. The type of products included are lipstick, oral hygiene products, haircare products, toilet water, mosquito oil, and a vitamin/iron supplement.
